segments.text: The ATM machine outside won't give me back my card .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Let's go take a look at it . Do you have your ID with you ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Okay , I see the problem . You forgot your code , didn't you ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: The machine gives you three attempts to enter the correct code and after that it assumes that you are not the real owner and confiscates it .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh . But can I have my card back now ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , I can get it for you but I need to go back inside the bank .
segments.speaker: S2
